name: basis
description: Fetches basis data from Binance futures, calculating the price difference between futures contracts and the index price. Output includes: basis value (futures price - index price), basis rate (percentage difference), index price, and futures price. The data is returned as compact CSV with relative timestamps for token efficiency. Useful for analyzing futures market sentiment and contract pricing trends.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve (max 500)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch
